page.title: 01ADDERLEY
page.content: Adderley is a small village with about sixty houses and bungalows.There is a village school,nearly all the children from Adderley go to it.There is also a Bowling Green,Village Hall,Garage,Post Office,and an Antique shop.There is a Village Green we play on by the Village Hall,we climb the trees there. There are some old swings near the old Railway the top of Green Bank.There are three old peoples homes over looking the swings.Most of the people are friendly in Adderley,but some people keep themselves to themselves. Tom Butter owns the Post Office.He is building a house opposite the shop. There is also an Estate in Adderley but it is not very big.Adderley is a nice little village and we would not like anybody to change it.We are really a little commuter/farming place.
